Articles.Content: I am fairly new to KSP, and was wondering where i could find an add-on that would create a noes cone covering the top of the spacecraft that carries items like rovers, satellites, ect..., to make the spacecraft more aerodynamic. Thanks.
What you are after is called a fairing, although with the current symplistic aerodynamic model they will only make your rocket perform worse. They will however make your rocket look better.
KW Rocketry has some cool fairings, but they're useless for the moment.
Fairing Factory; although the generated parts will require part.cfg editing, as its not been updated post 0.20.

Fairing Factory; although the generated parts will require part.cfg editing, as its not been updated post 0.20.

What changes are required specifically to the .cfg?
